Posts.Content: Hello I've had burning/tingling in upper back for almost a year on the left. Been see GP today having found hard pea size lump in left breast. My sister 1 year younger than me lost both breast. Being fast tracked for a check within 2 weeks. Told I will get appointment date in 5 days time. Scared, has anyone else felt the same symptoms?
Posts.Title: scared, fast tracked today
